prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Letters Regarding Robinson Jeffers's Stars,Accession # 5829-g, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was transferred from the Rare Books Division on 30 November 1993.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains a letter, 1930 October 5, Una Jeffers to Samuel Heiman, a Jeffers collector, conveying a copy of a scarce publication, giving information on the printing of Stars and describing a trip to the British Isles and New Mexico. A 1936 December 12 letter from Laurence Clark Powell to Mr. Schoonover conveys an inscribed copy of Starsand mentions a new poem printed by Grabhorn.

did.unittitle: Letter from Una Jeffers to Mr. Heiman 5 October 1930

scopecontent.p: Una Jeffers to Mr. Heiman, a Robinson Jeffers collector, conveying a copy of a scarce publication, giving information on the printing of Starsand describing trips to the British Isles and New Mexico.

did.unittitle: Letter from Lawrence Clark Powell to Mr. Schoonover 12 December 1936

scopecontent.p: Lawrence Clark Powell to Mr. Schoonover conveying an inscribed copy of Stars.
